subject: Shipping to EU
description_text:
Hello, 

I have a question before order new pedals. Do you send the package from EU warehouse? I am from Slovenia and would like to know, if I will have some import costs. As I know, if you will send it from EU warehouse, even if it is more than 150€, I won't have any customs... 

Thank you, 
Matic Potočnik

conversations.body_text: Hi Matic Potočnik,  We ship from our German warehouse—no need to worry.

Hello, 

I would just like to check is there everything OK with my order: #SSN4734. Ordered on 12th of December but it haven't been shiped yet. 

Thank you in advance and best regards, 
Matic Potočnik 


Od: "support"
Hi Matic Potočnik,  It will be sent to you this week and will arrive in about a week.
